tag_list: comparison-shopping-india, compare-prices, price-comparison, tolmol-com, compare-india, reviews, mp3-players, opinions, product-search, hot-deals, local-shops, sellers, dealers, business-directory, cars-comparison, mobiles, cell-phones, free-classifieds,
overview:
TolMol is a social comparison shopping service. TolMol’s mission is to empower people to make informed decisions. You can search and compare prices, features, and ratings of products and services in all popular categories like Mobiles, Computers, Electronics, Clothing, Autos, Travel, and more.

TolMol’s one stop search and comparison service saves you time â€“ you no longer need to jump from site to site to find that best deal on the product you are looking to buy. TolMol’s proprietary vertical search technology does just that for you. You can also find information on local shops, dealing in products and services of your interest, in your city.
